title: Cinnamon loaf cake
ingredients: ['250g (9 oz) plain flour', '200g (7 oz) caster sugar', '1 dessertspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon salt', '225ml (8 fl oz) buttermilk', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'For the topping', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 dessertspoon butter']
